text: pinnar nam (avarkalutaiya) tunpa nilaikkup patilaka (vacatikalulla) nalla nilaiyil marriyamaittom. Atil avarkal (celittup palkip) perukiya potu, avarkal; nam'mutaiya mutataiyarkalukkum tan ittakaiya tukkamum cukamum erpattiruntana" enru (alatciyamakak) kurinarkal - akaiyal avarkal unarntu kollata nilaiyil avarkalait titirena (vetanaiyaik kontu) pitittom
